data.message:
You know you have been to a good concert when you wake up the next morning your voice is gone and your body is so sore you can barely move!!!

Eminem was FUCKING AWESOME. its amazing to see a guy put so much effort into his rapping even though it was only about 2 hours.. you could see the energy , sweat and hardwork he put in! truly the artwork of a master... i wish the concert never ended ;'( 

#CAPETOWN
#BESTNIGHTLIFEEVER
#EMINEM
#RAPGOD
#RAPTURE2014
